main.foundation.evaluation
Class LMSEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.evaluation.Evaluator
      main.foundation.evaluation.LMSEvaluator
Direct Known Subclasses:
LMSHoldOutEvaluator, LMSLeaveOneOutEvaluator
public abstract class LMSEvaluator
extends jcolibri.evaluation.Evaluator

This abstract class defines the common behaviour of an evaluator.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tell Mueller-Pettenpohl
